person.note: Li(2) Guang [8079] Guang was purged by Qin Gui and exiled to Hainan island. His wife Guan(2) Shi's lineage claimed descent from Guan Zhong (Guanzi). She was the daughter of Guan(2) Shiren's [8070] nephew, Shike [3452]. Guang was Pan(1) Zhi's [7310] father-in-law. Guang's son, Mengjian [3521], was dismissed as Huaidong tiju in 1169. His youngest son, Mengzhuan [3522], was appointed Jiangzuo jian zhubu in 1194 and was Zeng(1) Ji's [1692] grandson-in-law. Wang(2) Yue(3) [1935] was Guang's menren. Chen Fuliang, WJ, 17.11b; Zhu Xi, WJ, 92.7a-9a (wife, born Guan, who died in 1175 at age 72); SHY:ZG, 71.23b; Liangzhe jinshi zhi, 10.22b; Zhejiang TZ, 124.17a. CBD, 2, 826-7.
